user_profile: User 562 is an active adult male with strong interest in fitness, frequently visiting various gyms throughout the week. He is open to new experiences, actively trying out different food shops and exploring various neighborhoods. His shopping habits reveal a conscious effort to balance quality and practicality, reflecting a middle socioeconomic status and a college-educated background.
